com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning

Class QLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.QLearner

  • public class QLearner
extends java.lang.Object
    Learns how to act based on rewards.
    Author:
    Team 2412.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QLearner.Action
      Actions available, represented by key-value pairs.
      static class  QLearner.Mode
      A mode that the QLearner can operate in.
      class  QLearner.Q
      Holds Q-Values.
      class  QLearner.State
      An environment state, represented by key-value pairs.

    • Field Detail

      • currentMode

        private QLearner.Mode currentMode
        The QLearner.Mode the learner is operating in.

      • learningRate

        private double learningRate
        Controls the portion of the time the learner is exploring vs exploiting. A rate of 0.2 is recommended, allowing for exploration randomly but also exploration through intelligent action.

      • discountFactor

        private double discountFactor
        Controls how much value is placed on future rewards. A higher value will place more emphasis on future rewards.

      • learnerAccuracy

        private double learnerAccuracy
        How accurate the maximization of reward should be. Higher accuracy comes at the cost of more computation time.

      • minimumStateValues

        public double[] minimumStateValues
        Minimum state parameter values.

      • minimumActionValues

        public double[] minimumActionValues
        Minimum action parameter values.

      • maximumStateValues

        public double[] maximumStateValues
        Maximum state parameter values.

      • maximumActionValues

        public double[] maximumActionValues
        Maximum action parameter values.

      • states

        private int states
        The number of state parameters.

      • actions

        private int actions
        The number of action parameters.

      • stateNames

        private java.lang.String[] stateNames
        A list of state parameter names.

      • actionNames

        private java.lang.String[] actionNames
        A list of action parameter names.

      • inputKeys

        private java.lang.String[] inputKeys
        String keys that represent state and action values. This is a joined array of stateNames and actionNames.

      • outputKeys

        private java.lang.String[] outputKeys
        String key that represents the output value from the Q Estimator.

      • qEstimator

        private NeuralNetworkQEstimator qEstimator
        An Artificial Neural Network that estimates Q-Values.

      • iterations

        private int iterations
        How many times the Q-Learner has had updated Q-Values. In practice, this will increment many times a second.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QLearner

        public QLearner(java.lang.String[] actions,
        java.lang.String[] states)
        Accepts string array of action values and environment state parameters
        Parameters:
        actions - the action parameters.
        states - the state parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • requestAction

        public QLearner.Action requestAction(QLearner.State state)
        Request action given current state.
        For use in Learn and Act modes.
        Parameters:
        state - the current environment state.
        Returns:
        the best action to maximize long-term reward.

      • estimateQ

        public QLearner.Q estimateQ(QLearner.State state,
                   QLearner.Action action)
        Estimate a Q-Value.
        Parameters:
        state - the state parameters.
        action - the action parameters.
        Returns:
        the estimated Q-Value.

      • updateQFactors

        public void updateQFactors(QLearner.State state,
                  QLearner.Action action,
                  QLearner.State newState,
                  double reward)
        Update the NeuralNetworkQEstimator Q values.
        Parameters:
        state - the old state.
        action - the action taken.
        reward - the reward gained.
        newState - the new state transitioned to.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(QLearner.Mode mode)
        Sets QLearner mode.
        • Watch: Gather data, but don't act.
        • Learn: Explore environment, act on data, but don't always choose best choice.
        • Act: Act on data, choose best choice.
        Parameters:
        mode - the new mode.

      • setLearningRate

        public void setLearningRate(double rate)
        Sets Learning rate.

        A higher learning rate will mean more choices are chosen randomly.

        Parameters:
        rate - the new rate.

      • setDiscountFactor

        public void setDiscountFactor(double rate)
        Sets Discount factor.

        A higher discount factor will mean more emphasis is placed on long-term reward.

        Parameters:
        rate - the new rate.

      • setAccuracy

        public void setAccuracy(double accuracy)
        Sets the Q maximization algorithm accuracy.
        A higher value will increase accuracy at the cost of computation time.
        Parameters:
        accuracy - the new accuracy.

      • indexOf

        private int indexOf(java.lang.String value,
          java.lang.String[] keys)
        Finds the value from an array of string keys
        Parameters:
        value - the value to look for.
        keys - the array of string keys.
        Returns:
        the index that the value was found at. Returns -1 if the value was not found.

        Fill double array with value
        Parameters:

        Returns:
